text: Blaine and his roommate Marissa provided the basics to facilitate our budget conscious explorations of Austin.  The arrangement has changed a bit since the photos were taken for his initial profile post, but there is still a guest room and bed, WiFi, linens, kitchen and laundry access.  Blaine's communication was timely and helpful, and, while our paths barely crossed, he was a courteous and unobtrusive host.  Since the location is close to a few different bus routes (including a Night Owl route), we were able to explore Austin without a car.    Bicycles are another transportation option we attempted, but had bad luck with flats and basic maintenance issues.  Those traveling by car will find this location very convenient to Interstate 35.
title: Great Room Mins to Downtown
